item.description:
The Regional Environmental Council has teamed up to celebrate a season of art at the REC Farmers Markets at Main South and Great Brook Valley. Through a traveling canvas mural, youth and other community members came together across two neighborhoods to create a unique collaborative mural. Come for the unveiling of the final product as well as a photo exhibit of top submissions from our Farmers Market Photo Contest.   Join us for an evening of live music, light refreshments, new people, and one of a kind art. Framed and unframed prints of the photos will be available for sale and pre-order at the event.
Opening Monday, March 14, 2011 from 5-7 pm.   The Davis Art Gallery
Printers Building, 44 Portland Street, 3rd Floor
Worcester, Massachusetts
800.533.2847
kcole@davisart.com   RSVP on the Facebook Event Page

Street parking or public library lot is available.   Best regards,   Laura Flavin, Davis Publications
item.why: Join us for an evening of live music, light refreshments, new people, and one of a kind art. Framed and unframed prints of the photos will be available for sale and pre-order at the event.

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Photo exhibit of top submissions from our Farmers Market Photo Contest
